name: FreshPantryDressing
0:
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry dressing for a vinaigrette dressing”
”Alexa, open fresh pantry dressing”
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry dressing for ranch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fresh pantry dressing
des:
Making a salad in the kitchen and want to make a quick salad dressing from scratch ? Now you can ask Alexa how to make 3 simple dressings with everyday items from your pantry. Current recipes include instructions for italian, ranch and balsamic vinaigrette dressings.

Say "Alexa open fresh pantry dressing" and follow the prompts. 

Say "Alexa ask fresh pantry dressing for an italian dressing recipe" for a specific recipe.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
